TextBlock.Text: Kata: Ok, the maintenance hatch is finished. Maintenance hatch? Maintenance hatch does not feel like it accurately describes what we just built!
Oli: Why did we need to go through all that work again? I mean, there's no way they'd be able to make it into the core with how well fortified it is, right?
Kata: Excuse me, GRAND maintenance slide into the ALL-POWERFUL CORE!
